item.title: The ugliest new vehicles on sale in Australia in 2026
item.description: Forget important stuff like quality, performance and value. Just once, we want to talk about one thing: which new vehicles are ugly.

item.title: Who bought electrified cars in 2025, and who stuck with petrol and diesel?
item.description: EVs and PHEVs are growing in popularity in Australia, and much of this growth is being driven by private buyers and not fleets.

item.description: The situation spells danger for the Big Bash finals and Australia’s T20 World Cup tilt.

item.description: The US president has vowed to slap new tariffs on eight European countries until a deal is reached.

item.description: At least 11 pipe bombs were discovered in an area popular with runners and dog walkers.
